metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33503 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in urllib3 before 1.26.5. When provided with a URL containing many @ characters in the authority component, the authority regular expression exhibits catastrophic backtracking, causing a denial of service if a URL were passed as a parameter or redirected to via an HTTP redirect.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> the python-pip package bundles python-urllib3 binaries when built. After updating python-urllib3, a no-change rebuild of python-pip is required.

criterions.comment: python-pip package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
python-urllib3 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
